attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing.
Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: ** Seller accepting reasonable offers** Could this be your first home? Are you looking to downsize and need a smaller space?  Are you looking to add to your investment portfolio?  This just might be what you have been looking for.  Includes a new privacy along the front, for the privacy you may be wanting.  This home gives you the feel of having just the right amount of space inside as well as a large yard to enjoy gatherings, plant a garden, or add you own flair.
